news.title: Tens of thousands of children finishing primary school without dental checks due to lack of HSE dentists
news.summary: Tens of thousands of children who are at risk of untreated tooth decay are not having dental screening until their last year in primary school or later because of a shortage of HSE dentists, it has emerged.

news.title: Met Éireann issues Status Orange rain and thunderstorm warnings with risk of flooding
news.summary: Met Éireann is warning of very heavy rain, thunder and widespread flooding in several counties on Monday.

news.title: Garry Ringrose returns as Jamie Osborne and Thomas Clarkson named in Lions squad led by Owen Farrell
news.summary: Ireland midfielder Garry Ringrose is on the bench for the clash which will be held at Melbourne’s Marvel Stadium, with Kinghorn named to start at full-back.

news.title: ‘It is absolutely not a front’ – former ‘major gangland player’ Shane Lyons now running mafia-themed restaurant in Dublin
news.summary: A convicted criminal who was previously classified by gardaí as being a major gangland player is now running a mafia-themed restaurant in the capital’s south inner city.

news.title: Eamonn Sweeney: Liam Cahill’s ‘comeback kids’ underline the genius of Tipperary’s courageous chief
news.summary: Dan Breen would have been proud of this Tipperary ambush. There have been bigger All-Ireland final upsets but none involving such spectacular reversals of fortune.

news.title: Granddaughter ‘left heartbroken’ after solicitor’s misconduct led to pensioner’s €19,000 nursing home bill going unpaid
news.summary: Serious failings by a lawyer left an elderly man’s granddaughter “heartbroken” and unable to access funds to pay his nursing home bills.

news.summary: Last summer, as Ireland went to the polls for the local and European elections, one man in Co Kerry prepared to engage in some good old-fashioned civic duty – just not quite his civic duty, as it turned out.

news.title: 'It’s the price of a night out... with none of the hangover.'  Why we’re swapping partying for pampering
news.summary: “People prioritise their self-care now in a way they didn’t ­before,” says Emma Brennan, assistant general manager of Eden One health club and spa in Dublin 4.

news.title: Ask Allison: My daughter was excluded by pals because I don’t allow social media. I’m furious their mums didn’t intervene
news.summary: My husband and I have been in a friend group with three other couples since our now 14-year-old children were in preschool. The three girls were all great friends until they were about 11 or 12 and then there was a bit of a division. Two of the girls remained friendly, and the other, my daughter, was left on the outside.

news.title: The Irish Independent’s View: Premier powerplay caps classy Tipperary All-Ireland win
news.summary: Cork have gone an entire generation without winning an All-Ireland title. But long-suffering Cork fans were confident 2025 was destined to be their year.
